title: Champ Select Freeze
body:
Hi all,

I have a bug for some while and some days i have it more often then other days. 

The bug is in championselect where my client freezes and the countdown goes to 0 while someone has to select a champion or ban a champsion. After this happends i can't ban or pick if im next in line. Sometimes it restores itself and I can ban or pick in time.

I have tried to update windows, shutdown my virusprogram, opening with lol.launcher.admin and reinstall/repare lol.

I dont know what to do anymore please help me!!

Greats Pasjag

replies.body:
This definitely sounds like some sort of weird connection issue.  If you have an unstable connection to PvP.net (the client, Champ select, etc), then our servers won't recognize your inputs or selections.  In order to get this resolved, make sure you complete the steps in our [Connection Issues KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has quite a number of steps, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

If you are still getting these issues in Champ Select, hit me up again and let me know!
